BasicECSJs.description: A basic javascript ECS system, with SceneManagers, Scenes and GameObjects with their own Start and Update functions.

BasicUnitTesterJs.description: BasicUnitTesterJs is a basic javascript unit tester designed to work on all JS platforms and be small and streamlined for the best developer experience.

DoubleLinkedListLibJs.description: A simple double linked list that stores the head, tail and length of the list

MatrixJs.description: A basic javascript library for dynamic and powerful matrices based on lists wrapped around with a powerful class.

OneWayLinkedListLibJs.description: A simple one way linked list that stores the head, tail and length of the list

Pixyp5js.description: A library for easily more easily dealing with pixels in images during runtime

Tilemapp5js.description: A simple to use & performant tilemap p5.js library

TurtleGFX.description: TurtleGFX allows to code with Turtle Graphics in JavaScript. Great for education and creative coding.

TurtleGraphics.description: Watch images being drawn using turtle graphics.

VecJs.description: A basic javascript library for dynamic vectors (e.g. vec2 & vec3) based on lists.

WebGL2FBO.description: A simple library for OOP encapsulation and abstraction of some of WebGL2 Framebuffers and the Renderbuffers they rely on

WebGL2Tex.description: A simple library for OOP encapsulation and abstraction of some of the different WebGL2 textures while still giving full control over them.

Zoomp5js.description: A simple library for adding the zooming functionality to your p5.js project.

BMWalker.js.description: A simple JavaScript library for drawing the biological motion 'Walker'.

c2.js.description: c2.js is a JavaScript library for creative coding based on computational geometry, physics simulation, evolutionary algorithm and other modules.

canvasGUI.description: Create GUI controls directly on your canvas.

concaveHull.description: Calculate a Concave Hull from a set of points in 2D space

HY5.description: hydra ğŸ™ p5.js ~ share visuals between both frameworks!

lygia.description: LYGIA is a shader library of reusable functions that will let you prototype, port or ship a project in just few minutes. It's very granular, flexible and efficient. Support multiple shading languages and can easily be added to any project, enviroment or framework of your choice.

ml5.js.description: Friendly machine learning for the webâ€”a neighborly approach to creating and exploring artificial intelligence in the browser.

nÃºmero.description: A friendly and intuitive math library for p5.js.

p5.5.description: Add UI to p5.js and other goodies

p5.FIP.description: Real-time image processing library - add filters and post-processing to your p5.js sketches.

p5.Modbuttons.description: a simple and modular button system for p5js

p5.Polar.description: p5.Polar provides mathematical abstractions making it easy to create create beautiful, kaleidoscopic, radial patterns.

p5.SceneManager.description: p5.SceneManager helps you create sketches with multiple states / scenes. Each scene is a like a sketch within the main sketch.

p5.Sprite.description: A basic sprite library that supports both animated and static sprites for p5.js

p5.Utils.description: p5.Utils is a tool collection for my coding class, featuring a pixel ruler, gradient fill color bindings, and other helpful shortcuts for beginners.

p5.anaglyph.description: A library for creating 3D stereoscopic 3D scenes and images using red/cyan glasses

p5.animS.description: Animates p5.js shapes by rendering their drawing processes.

p5.asciify.description: Apply real-time ASCII conversion to your favourite WebGL p5.js sketches to create unique, text-based visuals instantly.

p5.bezier.description: p5.bezier helps draw BÃ©zier curves with more than four control points and closed curves.

p5.ble.description: A Javascript library that enables communication between your BLE devices and your p5.js sketch.

p5.brush.description: Unlock custom brushes, natural fill effects and intuitive hatching in p5.js.

p5.collide2d.description: p5.collide2D provides tools for calculating collision detection for 2D geometry with p5.js.

p5.colorGenerator.description: p5.colorGenerator generates harmonious color schemes by starting from a given base color or selecting a random color as a starting point.

p5.comfyui-helper.description: A library for interfacing with ComfyUI

p5.createLoop.description: Create animation loops with noise and GIF exports in one line of code.

p5.csg.description: A library for constructive solid geometry. Do Boolean operations on your p5.Geometry to make new shapes!

p5.fab.description: p5.fab controls digital fabrication machines from p5.js!

p5.fillGradient.description: Fill shapes in p5.js with Linear, Radial and Conic Gradients.

p5.filterRenderer.description: A library for rendering 3D scenes with depth-of-field blur and with ambient occlusion shadows.

p5.flex.description: p5 container with responsive canvas feature.

p5.geolocation.description: p5.geolocation provides techniques for acquiring, watching, calculating, and geofencing user locations for p5.js.

p5.glitch.description: p5.js library for glitching images and binary files in the web browser

p5.grain.description: Conveniently add film grain, seamless texture overlays, and manipulate pixels to achieve nostalgic and artistic effects in p5.js sketches and artworks.

p5.joystick.description: Connect and play with physical joysticks.

p5.localessage.description: p5.localmessage provides a simple interface to send messages locally from one sketch to another.

p5.mapper.description: A projection mapping library for p5.js

p5.palette.description: A library to manage color palettes in p5.js

p5.party.description: quickly prototype networked multiplayer games and apps

p5.pattern.description: A pattern drawing library for p5.js.

p5.qol.description: Extend p5 with Quality of Life utilities.

p5.quadrille.js.description: A library for creating puzzle and board games, and for visual computing experiments.

p5.Riso.description: p5.Riso is a library for generating files suitable for Risograph printing. It helps turn your sketches into multi-color prints.

p5.scaler.description: Smart scaling of p5.js sketches in a variety of ways (to fit the browser's inner dimensions, to fit the canvas DOM container, to a specific ratio, etc).

p5.serialserver.description: p5.serialserver is a p5.js library that enables communication between your p5.js sketch and a serial enabled device, for example, an Arduino microcontroller.

p5.simpleAR.description: A simple JavaScript library that easily converts existing p5.js sketches to AR.

p5.speech.description: p5.speech provides simple, clear access to the Web Speech and Speech Recognition APIs, allowing for the easy creation of sketches that can talk and listen.

p5.teach.js.description: A beginner friendly math animation library for p5.js

p5.toio.description: A JavaScript library for controlling toioâ„¢Core Cube from p5.js sketches.

p5.touchgui.description: p5.touchgui is intended to extend p5.js and make it easy to add buttons, sliders, and other GUI (graphical user interface) objects to your p5.js sketches, enabling you to focus on quickly iterating ideas with easily created GUI objects that work with both mouse and multi-touch input.

p5.treegl.description: Shader development and space transformations WEBGL p5.js library.

p5.tween.description: With p5.tween you can create easily animations as tween in a few keyframes.

p5.videorecorder.description: Record your canvas as a video file with audio.

p5.webserial.description: A library for interacting with Serial devices from within the browser, based on Web Serial API (available on Chrome and Edge).

p5.xr.description: A library for creating VR and AR sketches with p5.

p5jsDebugCam.description: A basic keyboard only debug camera for p5.js

p5mirror.description: A library to download your editor.p5js sketches into a git repo or locally

p5play.description: JS game engine that uses p5.js for graphics and Box2D for physics.

p5snap.description: a command-line interface to create snapshots of sketches

p5videoKit.description: A dashboard for mixing video in the browser

pretty-grid.description: Create and manipulate grids with Javascript

rita.js.description: tools for natural language and generative writing

Shader Park.description: Explore shader programming through a JavaScript interface without the complexity of GLSL. Quickly script shaders using a P5.js style language.

simple.js.description: Helper functions and defaults for young and new coders.

Total Serialism.description: A toolbox full of methods for procedurally generating and transforming arrays mainly focused on algorithmic composition. Includes methods like markov-chain, cellular automaton, lindenmayer system, euclidean distribution and much more! Generate the array with your desired method and easily iterate over them in a for-loop to draw the results.

UI Renderer.description: Create a UI within your sketch, including utilities for different layouts and interactive sliders.

WEBMIDI.js.description: A user-friendly library to send and receive MIDI messages with ease.

XYscope.js.description: p5.js library to render graphics on analog vector displays

Animating with Media Objects.description: Learn how to load images and GIFs to your sketches by creating an interactive garden!

Color Gradients.description: Use radial gradients, linear gradients, and blend modes to create lens flare stickers & colorful filters on top of a webcam selfie.

Conditionals and Interactivity.description: A tutorial on how to use conditional statements and make interactive sketches.

Coordinates and Transformations.description: An overview of the different ways you can position objects in WebGL mode.

Creating and Styling HTML.description: Dive into the art of creative coding and learn to build and beautify HTML with p5.js.

Chatting with/about Code.description: Using generative AI to code with p5.js

Critical AI Prompt Battle.description: Build a tool to compare generative AI prompts

Critical AI Sentiment Dataset Explorer.description: Examine the datasets that run AI tools

Critical AI No-AI Chatbot.description: Make an interactive chatbot without using any AI

Creating Custom Geometry in WebGL.description: A guide to the different ways you can create your own 3D shapes.

Data Structure Garden.description: A tutorial on how to use JavaScript objects and arrays.

Field Guide to Debugging.description: Learn some healthy habits and best practices for  locating bugs in your program, and finding ways to overcome them.

Get Started.description: A tutorial that introduces basic p5.js functions and guides you through the steps to create an interactive landscape.

How to Optimize Your Sketches.description: An advanced tutorial on how to optimize code in your sketches to run more efficiently.

Introduction to GLSL.description: An introduction to the different ways you can create interesting visual effects with your computer's GPU using GLSL.

p5.strands: Introduction to Shaders.description: An introduction to shaders using p5.strands

Layered Rendering with Framebuffers.description: Framebuffers are the fastest way to create a scene out of multiple layers in WebGL. Explore how to use them, and the unique 3D information they provide.

Lights, Camera, Materials.description: Learn how to light and frame 3D scenes, and how to style 3D objects.

Loading and Selecting Fonts.description: Explore typography in creative coding: A Quick guide to choosing and selecting fonts.

Optimizing WebGL Sketches.description: Tips to help make your sketches run as smoothly as possible on as many devices as possible.

Organizing Code with Functions.description: A tutorial on how to create and use functions to help you organize your code.

How to Use the p5.js Web Editor with a S.description: A tutorial for setting up the p5.js Web Editor for screen readers.

Repeating with Loops.description: Create a crawling caterpillar race using loops and arrays!

Setting Up Your Environment.description: A quick tutorial for setting up the p5.js Web Editor and VS Code to write and save p5.js projects.

Variables and Change.description: Learn about variables and how they can be used to create animated sketches!

Writing Accessible Canvas Descriptions.description: A tutorial for how to label p5.js code for screen readers.
